description: Demolition of the existing Community Building and construction of an Extra Care development on part of the site of Hazelhurst Court, Beckenham Hill Road SE6, to provide 58 one-bedroom and 2 two-bedroom flats for older people, including the provision of 6 wheelchair units, together with shared communal facilities at ground floor including a kitchen, living rooms, staff rooms and multi-use spaces in 3 blocks of four-storeys arranged around a courtyard on the main site to the north of Hazelhurst Court [Block A] and 1 block of five-storeys to the south of 'Beckenham Park Heights' [Block B], with the re-organisation of 22 parking spaces (including 6 disabled vehicle bays), the provision of 64 cycle spaces, the felling of existing trees and provision of new tree planting and landscaping.
